scripts.validate: bun run typecheck && bun run lint && bun run ros-check
scripts.typecheck: cd apps/frontend && bun x tsc --noEmit && cd ../backend && bun run typecheck
scripts.ros-check: bash -c 'source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && cd robotics/ros2_ws && colcon build --symlink-install --packages-select simulation_manager amr_navigation && colcon test --packages-select simulation_manager amr_navigation && colcon test-result'
